title: Raheem Mostert on NFC Championship performance, career motivation, Super Bowl LIV (Football 1/21)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by 49ers running back and star of the NFC Championship game, Raheem Mostert, ahead of San Francisco's appearance in Super Bowl LIV. Mostert discusses his dominant performance vs the Packers, career adversity and motivation, fatherhood, playing the Super Bowl in his home state, the 49ers creative offense and more!
